name: Annual Business Survey aggregate R&D estimates for companies with 1–9 employees, by questionnaire reference and company size: 2017
description: Annual Business Survey aggregate R&D estimates for companies with 1–9 employees, by questionnaire reference and company size: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States. R&D data are tabulated only for records reporting $50,000 or more in R&D expenditures.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and U.S. Census Bureau, Annual Business Survey, 2017.
